Title: Unfaithful
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Freddie Highmore, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (story editor)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norma is torn between Norman and Romero; during a holiday outing, Norman comes to the realization that everyone has changed during his time away.
